ss7iCfgTable.name: ss7iCfgTable
ss7iCfgTable.description: The Configuration Table contains an entry for each of the manageable HiPer SS7i cards in the chassis. It contains objects that reflect the current configuration of parameters that affect the operation of all the entities that reside on the given card.

ss7iCfgEntry.name: ss7iCfgEntry
ss7iCfgEntry.description: There is one Configuration Table entry per HiPer SS7i Card in the chassis.

ss7iCfgIndex.name: ss7iCfgIndex
ss7iCfgIndex.description: A unique value for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis. The value of ss7iCfgIndex matches the value of the index for the corresponding HiPer SS7i card entity in the entity table of the chassis MIB.

ss7iCfgIpAddr.name: ss7iCfgIpAddr
ss7iCfgIpAddr.description: The IP address on interface 0 of the HiPer SS7i.

ss7iCfgNetmask.name: ss7iCfgNetmask
ss7iCfgNetmask.description: The netmask on interface 0 of the HiPer SS7i.

ss7iCfgDfltGwIpAddr.name: ss7iCfgDfltGwIpAddr
ss7iCfgDfltGwIpAddr.description: The IP address of the default IP routing gateway.

ss7iCfgProtocol.name: ss7iCfgProtocol
ss7iCfgProtocol.description: The external signaling protocol running over the TCP/IP connection with the external signaling gateway. Default = hss7iSlapV2(1).

ss7iCfgGwConnStartMethod.name: ss7iCfgGwConnStartMethod
ss7iCfgGwConnStartMethod.description: The method used by the HiPer SS7i to bring up the TCP/IP connection to the external signaling gateway at boot time.

ss7iCfgGwIpAddr.name: ss7iCfgGwIpAddr
ss7iCfgGwIpAddr.description: The primary external SS7 gateway IP address. Valid for SLAP only.

ss7iCfgGwPort.name: ss7iCfgGwPort
ss7iCfgGwPort.description: The primary external SS7 gateway port number. Valid for SLAP only.

ss7iCfgSecGwIpAddr.name: ss7iCfgSecGwIpAddr
ss7iCfgSecGwIpAddr.description: The secondary external SS7 gateway IP address. Valid for SLAP only.

ss7iCfgSecGwPort.name: ss7iCfgSecGwPort
ss7iCfgSecGwPort.description: The secondary external SS7 gateway port number. Valid for SLAP only.

ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerNearEnd.name: ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerNearEnd
ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerNearEnd.description: The HiPer SS7i heartbeat timer. Upon expiration, the HiPer SS7i will send a heartbeat message to the external SS7 gateway. The time should be less than what the gateway expects. Valid for SLAP only. Default = 15000 msec.

ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerFarEnd.name: ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerFarEnd
ss7iCfgHrtbtTimerFarEnd.description: The external SS7 gateway heartbeat timer. Upon expiration it causes the HiPer SS7i to commence the connection re-establishment procedure to the external SS7 gateway. The time should be longer than what the external SS7 gateway is set to. Valid for SLAP only. Default = 15000 msec.

ss7iCfgChassisId.name: ss7iCfgChassisId
ss7iCfgChassisId.description: This uniquely identifies logical Chassis under the control of the HiPer SS7I, valid for SLAP only. The OCTET STRING format must be FF FF FF FF .

ss7iCfgGwConnRetryCnt.name: ss7iCfgGwConnRetryCnt
ss7iCfgGwConnRetryCnt.description: The number of times the HiPer SS7i will attempt to re-establish the TCP/IP connection to the external SS7 gateway after the initial failure was detected. Valid for SLAP only. Default = 3.

ss7iCfgGwConnRetryIntvl.name: ss7iCfgGwConnRetryIntvl
ss7iCfgGwConnRetryIntvl.description: The time interval between attempts of the HiPer SS7i to re-establish the TCP/IP connection to the external SS7 gateway. Valid for SLAP only. Default = 2 sec.

ss7iCfgGwMssdHrtbtThrsh.name: ss7iCfgGwMssdHrtbtThrsh
ss7iCfgGwMssdHrtbtThrsh.description: The number of external SS7 gateway heartbeat timeouts allowed before the connection to the gateway is considered lost. A setting of 0 means no attempt will be made to re-establish the connection. Default = 1.

ss7iCmdTable.name: ss7iCmdTable
ss7iCmdTable.description: The Command table contains an entry for each of the manageable HiPer SS7i cards in the chassis. It provides a means through which to take specific actions on them.

ss7iCmdEntry.name: ss7iCmdEntry
ss7iCmdEntry.description: There is one Command Table entry per HiPer SS7i card in the chassis.

ss7iCmdIndex.name: ss7iCmdIndex
ss7iCmdIndex.description: A unique value for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis. The value of this object matches the value of the index of the corresponding HiPer SS7i card's entry in the entity table of the chassis MIB.

ss7iCmdMgtStationId.name: ss7iCmdMgtStationId
ss7iCmdMgtStationId.description: This object is a generic read-write variable that a Management Station (MS) can use to guarantee that the results from a given command are the results of a command issued by that specific MS. Each MS must SET a unique value to this object when doing commands and GET the value of this object together with ss7iCmdReqId and ss7iCmdResult to detect interference from other MSs.

ss7iCmdReqId.name: ss7iCmdReqId
ss7iCmdReqId.description: This object contains the value of the request-id field in the SNMP PDU which invoked the current or most recent command or test on this HiPer SS7i card. If the request-id is unknown or undefined, this object contains the value zero.

ss7iCmdFunction.name: ss7iCmdFunction
ss7iCmdFunction.description: This object contains a value which describes the command which is being invoked.

ss7iCmdForce.name: ss7iCmdForce
ss7iCmdForce.description: In some cases, the HiPer SS7i card may be in a state such that certain commands could adversely affect connections. In such cases, a command request with this object not present or set to noForce will result in a warning. If the operator elects to ignore such warnings, this object can be set to force in a subsequent issue of the command to cause the command to be carried out regardless of its potentially hazzardous effects.

ss7iCmdParam.name: ss7iCmdParam
ss7iCmdParam.description: This object contains parameters that are specific to the particular command being issued. In some cases, there will be no aditional parameters required.

ss7iCmdResult.name: ss7iCmdResult
ss7iCmdResult.description: This object contains the result of the most recently requested command or test, or the value none(1) if no commands have been requested since the last reset.

ss7iCmdCode.name: ss7iCmdCode
ss7iCmdCode.description: The value of this object upon command completion indicates a further description of what went wrong if the command was unsuccessful. In the case of tests, a bit mapped result of each of the sub-tests performed can be found in the status table.

ss7iTrapTable.name: ss7iTrapTable
ss7iTrapTable.description: Table containing objects to enable traps on the HiPer SS7i cards in the chassis.

ss7iTrapEntry.name: ss7iTrapEntry
ss7iTrapEntry.description: There is one entry for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis.

ss7iTrapIndex.name: ss7iTrapIndex
ss7iTrapIndex.description: A unique index identifying the HiPer SS7i card to which the trap enable objects pertain.

ss7iTrapPbusLinkUp.name: ss7iTrapPbusLinkUp
ss7iTrapPbusLinkUp.description: Enables reporting of a trap and/or log message when the ENFAS packet bus signaling link to the HiPer Dsp comes up. Default = disableAll(2).

ss7iTrapPbusLinkDown.name: ss7iTrapPbusLinkDown
ss7iTrapPbusLinkDown.description: Enables reporting of a trap and/or log message when the ENFAS packet bus signaling link to the HiPer Dsp goes down. Default = disableAll(2).

ss7iTrapGwConnUp.name: ss7iTrapGwConnUp
ss7iTrapGwConnUp.description: Enables reporting of a trap and/or log message when the TCP/IP signaling connection to the SS7 (or media) gateway comes up. Default = disableAll(2).

ss7iTrapGwConnDown.name: ss7iTrapGwConnDown
ss7iTrapGwConnDown.description: Enables reporting of a trap and/or log message when the TCP/IP signaling connection to the SS7 (or media) gateway goes down. Default = disableAll(2).

ss7iStatTable.name: ss7iStatTable
ss7iStatTable.description: The Statistics table contains an entry for each of the manageable HiPer SS7i cards in the chassis. It contains objects that reflect the current status of the card.

ss7iStatEntry.name: ss7iStatEntry
ss7iStatEntry.description: There is one Statistics table entry for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis.

ss7iStatIndex.name: ss7iStatIndex
ss7iStatIndex.description: A unique value for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis. The value of ss7iStatIndex matches the value of the index for the corresponding Hiper SS7i card entity in the entity table of the chassis MIB.

ss7iStatGwConnStatus.name: ss7iStatGwConnStatus
ss7iStatGwConnStatus.description: Status of the TCP/IP connection with the external signaling gateway. Valid for SLAP only.

ss7iStatGwNumMsgsRcvd.name: ss7iStatGwNumMsgsRcvd
ss7iStatGwNumMsgsRcvd.description: The number of messages received from the external SS7 gateway or the Media Gateway Controller.

ss7iStatGwNumBytesRcvd.name: ss7iStatGwNumBytesRcvd
ss7iStatGwNumBytesRcvd.description: The number of bytes received from the external SS7 gateway or the Media Gateway Controller.

ss7iStatGwNumMsgsSent.name: ss7iStatGwNumMsgsSent
ss7iStatGwNumMsgsSent.description: The number of messages sent to the external SS7 gateway or the Media Gateway Controller.

ss7iStatGwNumBytesSent.name: ss7iStatGwNumBytesSent
ss7iStatGwNumBytesSent.description: The number of bytes sent to the external SS7 gateway or the Media Gateway Controller.

ss7iStatGwMssdHrtbtCnt.name: ss7iStatGwMssdHrtbtCnt
ss7iStatGwMssdHrtbtCnt.description: The accumulated number of missed heartbeat messages expected to arrive from the external SS7 gateway.

ss7iStatGwLinkLostCnt.name: ss7iStatGwLinkLostCnt
ss7iStatGwLinkLostCnt.description: The accumulated number of times the physical Ethernet connection is unplugged or severed.

ss7iStatGwLinkErrCnt.name: ss7iStatGwLinkErrCnt
ss7iStatGwLinkErrCnt.description: The accumulated number of errors encountered sending to or receiving from the external SS7 gateway when the TCP/IP connection is believed to be healthy.

ss7iStatGwLinkDownCause.name: ss7iStatGwLinkDownCause
ss7iStatGwLinkDownCause.description: The reason the signaling connection to the external SS7 gateway went down.

ss7iHdmTable.name: ss7iHdmTable
ss7iHdmTable.description: The ss7iHdm table contains objects for all of the HiPer Dsp cards in the chassis.

ss7iHdmEntry.name: ss7iHdmEntry
ss7iHdmEntry.description: There is one entry for each HiPer Dsp Card in the chassis.

ss7iHdmIndex.name: ss7iHdmIndex
ss7iHdmIndex.description: A unique value for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis. The value of ss7iHdmIndex matches the value of the index for the corresponding HiPer SS7i card entity in the entity table of the chassis MIB.

ss7iHdmIndex2.name: ss7iHdmIndex2
ss7iHdmIndex2.description: The secondary index into the ss7iHdm table. There is one entry for each Hiper Dsp in the chassis. The value of the index is equal to the chassis slot number of a HiPer Dsp card.

ss7iHdmConnState.name: ss7iHdmConnState
ss7iHdmConnState.description: The state of the signaling packet bus connection to the HiPer Dsp. There is one connection from the HiPer SS7i card to each HiPer Dsp in the chassis.

ss7iHdmSndPktsOkCnt.name: ss7iHdmSndPktsOkCnt
ss7iHdmSndPktsOkCnt.description: The number of packets successfully transmitted over the signaling packet bus connection.

ss7iHdmSndPktsFailCnt.name: ss7iHdmSndPktsFailCnt
ss7iHdmSndPktsFailCnt.description: The number of packets failing to transmit over the signaling packet bus connection.

ss7iHdmRcvPktsOkCnt.name: ss7iHdmRcvPktsOkCnt
ss7iHdmRcvPktsOkCnt.description: The number of packets sucessfully received over the signaling packet bus connection.

ss7iHdmRcvPktsFailCnt.name: ss7iHdmRcvPktsFailCnt
ss7iHdmRcvPktsFailCnt.description: The number of signaling packet bus connection packets rejected by the HiPer SS7i message handler.

ss7iHdmLinkDownCause.name: ss7iHdmLinkDownCause
ss7iHdmLinkDownCause.description: The reason the packet bus ENFAS signaling link to the HiPer Dsp went down.

ss7iSigPbTable.name: ss7iSigPbTable
ss7iSigPbTable.description: The ss7iSigPb table contains objects for managing the signaling packet bus connections to all of the HiPer Dsp cards in the chassis.

ss7iSigPbEntry.name: ss7iSigPbEntry
ss7iSigPbEntry.description: There is one entry for each HiPer Dsp Card in the chassis.

ss7iSigPbIndex.name: ss7iSigPbIndex
ss7iSigPbIndex.description: A unique value for each HiPer SS7i card in the chassis. The value of ss7iSigPbIndex matches the value of the index for the corresponding HiPer SS7i card entity in the entity table of the chassis MIB.

ss7iSigPbIndex2.name: ss7iSigPbIndex2
ss7iSigPbIndex2.description: The secondary index into the ss7iSigPb table. There is one entry for each Hiper Dsp in the chassis. The value of the index is equal to the chassis slot number of a HiPer Dsp card.

ss7iSigPbConnection.name: ss7iSigPbConnection
ss7iSigPbConnection.description: The means to enable or disable a signaling packet bus connection between the HiPer SS7i and a Hiper Dsp. Default = disable(1).

ss7iSigPbLoopback.name: ss7iSigPbLoopback
ss7iSigPbLoopback.description: The means to enable or disable the loopback state on the signaling packet bus connection between the HiPer SS7i and a Hiper Dsp. Default = disable(1).
